# t-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute       | Description                                  | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | --------------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `customClass` | `custom-class`  | (required) Card class                        | `string`  | `''`        |
| `deselected`  | `deselected`    | (optional) Deselected card                   | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`      | (optional) Disabled card                     | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `imageTop`    | `image-top`     | (optional) Card image at the top             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `imageTopAlt` | `image-top-alt` | (optional) Card image alternative at the top | `string`  | `''`        |
| `size`        | `size`          | (optional) Card size                         | `string`  | `''`        |
| `theme`       | `theme`         | (optional) Card theme                        | `string`  | `''`        |
| `variant`     | `variant`       | (optional) Card variant                      | `string`  | `''`        |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                | Description                            |
| ----------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `--card-background`                 | Background color of the card           |
| `--card-body-padding`               | Padding of the card body               |
| `--card-border`                     | Border of the card                     |
| `--card-border-color`               | Border color of the card               |
| `--card-border-radius`              | Border radius of the card              |
| `--card-box-shadow`                 | Box shadow of the card                 |
| `--card-color`                      | Color of the card                      |
| `--card-footer-background`          | Background of the card footer          |
| `--card-footer-border-top`          | Border top of the card footer          |
| `--card-footer-border-top-color`    | Border top color of the card footer    |
| `--card-footer-font-size`           | Font size of the card footer           |
| `--card-header-background`          | Background of the card header          |
| `--card-header-border-bottom`       | Border bottom of the card header       |
| `--card-header-border-bottom-color` | Border bottom color of the card header |
| `--card-header-font-size`           | Font size of the card header           |
| `--card-header-padding`             | Padding of the card header             |
| `--card-max-width`                  | Max-width of the card                  |
| `--card-width`                      | Width of the card                      |
